patthana16.82:4.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ savitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasavitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.82:4.2: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ savitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasavitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe …
patthana16.82:4.4: anidassanaappaṭighaṃ savitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasavitakko ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nasavitakko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.82:5.1: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
patthana16.82:6.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ avitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naavitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.82:6.2: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ avitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho naavitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.82:6.3: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ avitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naavitakko ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naavitakko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
